snippet: Video of Egypt’s deposed president, Mohamed Morsi, in court was broadcast on state television and widely shared online.
abstract: Video of Egypt’s deposed president, Mohamed Morsi, in court was broadcast on state television and widely shared online.

byline.original: By ROBERT MACKEY and LIAM STACK

headline.main: Reaction on the Streets and Online as Morsi Appears in Court
